keywords.value: Garcia Rodriguez, Juan de la Caridad
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: Jaime Ortega y Alamino has been a savvy political operator who aided the Vatican’s secret efforts to broker détente between Washington and Havana.

headline.print_headline: Cardinal Who Expanded the Church’s Reach in Cuba Plans to Step Down
headline.main: Cardinal and Longtime Catholic Leader in Cuba to Step Down

snippet: Jaime Ortega y Alamino has been a savvy political operator who aided the Vatican’s secret efforts to broker détente between Washington and Havana.
abstract: Cardinal Jaime Ortega y Alamino is retiring as head of Cuba's Roman Catholic Church and will be replaced by Juan del la Caridad Garcia Rodriguez; politically deft Alamino helped broker thaw in relations between Cuba and United States, but it remains uncertain whether Rodriguez will carry out same political duties.
